# baseline

**Instance Property**

The distance from the top of the image to its baseline.

## Declaration

```swift
let baseline: CGFloat
```

## Discussion

If the image has no baseline, this value is equivalent to the image’s height.

## Getting the image properties

- **size**: The size of the image.
- **shading**: An optional shading to fill the image with.

items.description: An optional shading to fill the image with.
